title: Special
lyrics:
Focus, can’t help but notice
Keep the flame lit, now on the same shit
So nice had to do it twice, yeah I shine like the moonlight
I’ll find you, when you go
You gotta vibe vibe vibe puttin' on for ya man baby

We so high if you fallin’ I’ma catch ya when you land

I’m so starstruck when I see ya, I’m your biggest fan

You hold my heart and you didn’t even have to use your hands baby



Special (special) special (Ooohhh)

All I want is you around baby, never goin’ out of style baby

Special, special

Only one of you around baby, I just want to love you down baby



Hate to see ya leave but I love it when you come through

Ain’t another woman that can change the way I want you

Everytime I take a hit I reminisce about you

Just reminds me, yeah



You gotta vibe vibe vibe puttin' on for ya man baby

We so high if you fall, then I'ma catch ya when you land

I’m so starstruck when I see ya I’m your biggest fan

You hold my heart and ya didn’t even have to use your hands baby



Special (special baby) special (Ooooh)

All I want is you around baby, never goin’ out of style baby

Special, special

Only one of you around baby, I just want to love you down baby



Ya flawless like them VVS diamonds

Wanna show you off baby

Yeah every time they take a look at you

They gon see why your mine baby

Your the VIP

Don’t need no RSVP

Hit yo line like 143

Let me show ya what you mean to me



Special (special), special (special)

All I want is you around baby, never goin’ out of style baby

Special (special baby), special (yeah, yeaaah)

Only one of you around baby, I just want to love you down baby
